snippet: The vote of no confidence ended the prime minister’s tenure after about a year, and it came after a dispute with the president over a cabinet reshuffle.
abstract: Somalia lawmakers oust Prime Min Abdiweli Sheikh Ahmed Mohamed in 153-80 vote; accuse Ahmed of incompetence and failing to cooperate with Pres Hassan Sheikh Mohamud.
lead_paragraph: The vote of no confidence ended the prime minister’s tenure after about a year, and it came after a dispute with the president over a cabinet reshuffle.

headline.main: After a Feud, Lawmakers in Somalia Oust Premier
headline.print_headline: After a Feud, Lawmakers in Somalia Oust Premier
